message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which is valued at $1,200,000. I understand its immense worth to you and would like to extend an exclusive offer. For a limited time only, I am willing to sell it to you at a special price of $1,100,000. This is an exceptional opportunity to secure such a valuable asset at a discounted rate. Please let me know if you are interested in proceeding with this offer.
